info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 8:21AM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN FAYETTE AND NORTHEASTERN PRESTON COUNTIES THROUGH 900 AM EDT... At 820 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Uniontown, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Farmington, Markleysburg, Chalkhill, Ohiopyle, Clifton Mills, and Hazelton. This includes Interstate 68 in West Virginia between mile markers 30 and 31. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
